dict.acceptation: 事实，实情；实际；真相，证据；犯罪行为；

sent.orig: Be a FACT user & input all required production related information in FACT daily.
sent.trans: 每天将FACT系统需要的相关生产数据更新到系统中。

sent.orig: FACT shows families the functionality of the computer in their lives.
sent.trans: FACT主要是为家庭演示电脑在他们生活中的作用。

sent.orig: Fact can be divided into primary fact, indirect fact and auxiliary fact.
sent.trans: 事实有主要事实、间接事实和辅助事实之分。

sent.orig: That's a fact. A heartbreaking fact. But still a fact.
sent.trans: 这是事实。让人心碎的事实。但仍然是事实。

sent.orig: Excuse me, sir, I have a fact for you. An actual fact.
sent.trans: 打扰一下，先生，我有个事实要告诉你。一个真实的状况。
